doc.after: Music is an art form whose medium is sound Common elements of music are pitch which governs melody and harmony rhythm and its associated concepts tempo meter and articulation dynamics and the sonic qualities of timbre and texture The creation performance significance and even the definition of music vary according to culture and social context Music ranges from strictly organized compositions and their reproduction in performance through improvisational music to aleatoric forms Music can be divided into genres and subgenres although the dividing lines and relationships between music genres are often subtle sometimes open to individual interpretation and occasionally controversial Within the arts music may be classified as a performing art a fine art and auditory art
